Section homepage

The section homepage serves as a landing page for a program, team, or business unit within the department.

Available in: Squiz Matrix

Use this page to provide context about the section, engage users with key messaging, and direct them to relevant content.

Example (Education theme)

View template

Usage

  • This template is composed of multiple components:
    • Banner
    • Section links
    • Link group
    • Teasers
    • Local footer
  • Squiz Matrix users:
    • The order of components on this page cannot be altered.
